concept.title: Profiles and Audiences
concept.shortdesc: Audience Services is part of the Master Marketing Profile (MMP). The MMP is a collection of behavioral data, audience membership, real-time context, and external data about a visitor. The Marketing Cloud lets you leverage the Master Marketing Profiles of your visitors for cross-solution workflows.

conbody.p: Two important concepts in the Master Marketing Profile are:

section.title: Context
section.p: Context describes the details of a visitor's current interaction with a digital property. Examples of context include:

ul.li: The value of a visitor's shopping cart
The state of a form field

section.p: Dynamic tag management, a Marketing Cloud tool, provides the most robust context detection and service activation capability on the market today. It provides the contextual component of Master Marketing Profiles.
